title: Agent Group Schema
description: Agent Group json-specification : A full description of fields of an agent group definition yaml file.

ArrayOfStrings.description: An array of strings custom type.

agentArgument.description: [Optional] - Array of dictionary-like objects, defining the agent arguments.

type.description: [Required] - Type of the agent argument : respecting the jsonschema types.

value.description: [Optional] - Default value of the agent argument.

agentPortMapping.description: [Optional] - Array of dictionary-like objects, defining the port mapping.

name.description: [Optional] - Agent group full Name, accept lower case ascii, number and _, - characters.

image.description: [Optional] - Path to the agent group image.

agents.description: [Required] - List of dictionary-like objects explaining the agents belonging to the current agent group.

key.description: [Required] - Key of the agent of the form agent/<organisation prefix>/<agent name>.

version.description: [Optional] - Version of the agent, can either be an exact version like 1.2.3 or a regular expression to match against a version range like 1\..*.

replicas.description: [Optional] - Count of replicas of the agent instances, default value is 1.

port_mapping.description: [Optional] - List of the agent port mapping.

mounts.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of the mounts of the agent, this will override default mounts.

caps.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of kernel capabilities to add to the agent container instance (e.g CAP_NET_ADMIN)

cyclic_processing_limit.description: [Optional] - Count of how often the processing of a message can go through the same agent, if no value is specified, means no limit.

depth_processing_limit.description: [Optional] - Count of how deep the processing of a message can go through the agents, if no value is specified, means no limit.

accepted_agents.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of the accepted agents, if no value is specified, means all agents are accepted.

in_selectors.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of the in_selectors that the agent should listen to.
